landing.title: Welcome To A High Cognitive Dating Experience

information.title: We Do Date
information.body: This platform focuses on how people think, reason, and communicateâ€”not just appearance.

qr_code.title: Scan Your QR Code
qr_code.description: Scan A QR code to confirm membership.

navigation_menu.title: Navigation Menu
navigation_menu.description: This section details how the user can navigate between matches, profiles, and filters.

profile_page.title: Profile Page
profile_page.description: Includes a photo, age, location, I.Q. range, and 3 badges for thought process.

match_page.title: Match Page
match_page.description: Choose between viewing matches in a card view style vs. list view style.

card.description: Card view includes a photo, age, location, I.Q. range, and 3 badges for thought process. Buttons for like and message user.

list.description: List view includes a name, photo, age, and location.

card_view.title: Card View
card_view.description: Includes a photo, age, location, I.Q. range, and 3 badges for thought process. Buttons for like and message user.

list_view.title: List View
list_view.description: Includes a name, photo, age, and location.

likes_and_swipes.title: Likes and Swipes
likes_and_swipes.description: Filter interests, view list, conversation prompts, and badges.

find_minds_like_yours.title: Find Minds Like Yours
find_minds_like_yours.description: search users with either a search bar and or 14 cognitive style thought process buttons.

conversations.title: Conversations
conversations.description: Explore six cognitively challenging thought process prompts.

cognitive_styles_answers.title: Cognitive Styles Answers
cognitive_styles_answers.description: This section allows the user to answer back to cognitive style prompts.
